SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectOneReportDetail()*/ A.* , B.NAME FROM TBL_REPORT A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO ) WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{ reportNo }
SELECT /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectOneReportDetail()*/ A.* FROM TBL_ITEM_CONTENT A WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{ no } ORDER BY A.PRIORITY
mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#selectOneReportDetail()*/ TBL_REPORT A SET A.REPORT_STATUS = '회수' WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{ no }
UPDATE /* com.qs.www.approval.model.dao.ApprovalDAO#callbackApproverPerReport()*/ TBL_APPROVER_PER_REPORT A SET A.APPROVER_TYPE = '미처리' WHERE A.REPORT_NO = #{ no }
